title: book_The_Island_At_The_Center_Of_The_World
text:
ISBN-13: 9781400078677.
ISBN-10: 1400078679.
Title: The Island At The Center Of The World.
Subtitle: The Epic Story Of Dutch Manhattan And The Forgotten Colony That Shaped America.
Authors: Russell Shorto.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=2oSJDQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A history of the Dutch role in the establishment of Manhattan discusses the rivalry between England and the Dutch Republic, focusing on the power struggle between Holland governor Peter Stuyvesant and politician Adriaen van der Donck that shaped New York's culture and social freedoms. Reprint. 50,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2005.
Average Rating: 4.13.
Number of Pages: 384.
Ratings Count: 6593.
